title: Oil: our hidden wealth
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company

description: Studies the search for oil in Australia, showing how oil is formed, the personnel and equipment needed in drilling a well, and how results of seismic recordings are interpreted. Describes actual drilling in Australia and Papua New Guinea.
